WidthSubdivisions: Number of subdivisions along the width
DepthSubdivisions: Number of subdivisions along the depth
bMaintainDimension: Whether to preserve the overall Width and Depth for a Rounded Rectangle, or to allow the rounded corners to extend outside those dimensions.
CornerRadius: Radius of rounded corners. This is only available for Rounded Rectangles.
CornerSlices: Number of radial slices for each rounded corner. This is only available for Rounded Rectangles.
